attributes.action: Treat public sector workers with the respect and pay they deserve.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is hard to believe that a Prime Minister of the UK could have such contempt for the people who work for the police, for the NHS (nurses, not the overpaid doctors) and those in classrooms today.  As the jobs get harder, the pay always fails to match the output of the individual.  Teachers, nurses and police officers hours are never brought up, the pressures are never discussed and the pay, never improved upon.  When the Prime Minister is flaunting himself with footballers who earn in a WEEK what a teacher does in TWO YEARS, it is nothing but disgusting.

rejection.details: Please request a specific action or change.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
